no-use-before-define: 0, functional/immutable-data: 0, @typescript-eslint/no-use-before-define: 0, no-var: 0, vars-on-top: 0 */
function inpFix() {
  var widget = document.querySelector('[data-selector="search-widget"]');
  var tabs = document.querySelectorAll('[data-selector="search-widget-tab"]');
  var fakeModal = document.querySelector('[data-selector="modal-loader"]');
  var closeButton = document.querySelector('[data-selector="modal-loader-close-button"]');

  function isMobile() {
    var match = window.matchMedia || window.msMatchMedia;
    var mq;

    if (match) {
      mq = match("(pointer:coarse)");
      return mq.matches || window.innerWidth <= 900;
    }

    return false;
  }

  if (!widget || !isMobile()) return;
  if (!window._travelshift) window._travelshift = {};
  if (!window._travelshift.chunksLoadingData) window._travelshift.chunksLoadingData = {};

  function showModal() {
    if (fakeModal) {
      fakeModal.style.display = "flex";
    }

    if (closeButton) {
      // hack to remove focus from iphone inputs
      closeButton.focus();
      closeButton.blur();
    }
  }

  function closeModal() {
    if (fakeModal) {
      fakeModal.style.display = "none";
      window._travelshift.chunksLoadingData.tabToLoad = undefined;
    }
  }

  function tabClickListener(e) {
    if (window._travelshift.chunksLoadingData.status !== "loaded") {
      window._travelshift.chunksLoadingData.tabToLoad = e.target.getAttribute("data-front-step-key");
    }
  }

  function chunksLoadEventListener() {
    removeListeners();
  }

  function addListeners() {
    if (widget) {
      widget.addEventListener("click", showModal);
    }

    if (closeButton) {
      closeButton.addEventListener("click", closeModal);
    }

    if (tabs.length) {
      tabs.forEach(function addTabListener(tab) {
        tab.addEventListener("click", tabClickListener);
      });
    }

    window.addEventListener("chunksLoaded", chunksLoadEventListener);
  }

  function removeListeners() {
    if (tabs.length) {
      tabs.forEach(function addTabListener(tab) {
        tab.removeEventListener("click", tabClickListener);
      });
    }

    if (widget) {
      widget.removeEventListener("click", showModal);
    }

    if (closeButton) {
      closeButton.removeEventListener("click", closeModal);
    }

    window.removeEventListener("chunksLoaded", chunksLoadEventListener);
  }

  addListeners();
}

try {
  inpFix();
} catch {
  /* */
}</script></div></div><div class="IframeVideo_iframeWrapper__KlVyJ IframeVideo_iframeWrapperReady__JB_KK"><div class="IframeVideo_iframeContainer__dtX4y"><iframe id="playerWrapper-hwxj_65Tb5o"
